description: Data for Minecraft Bedrock Edition addons.

identifier.title: identifier
identifier.description: The identifier is used to register the entity with the server. In the Client Entity Definitions JSON the identifier sets the appearance of the entity(materials, textures, geometry, etc.) The matching identifier in the Entity Behavior JSON in the Behavior Pack is what gives the entity its behaviors.

conditions.title: conditions
conditions.description: Conditions contain different components that players can use to customize natural biome spawning.

minecraft:spawns_on_surface.title: minecraft:spawns_on_surface
minecraft:spawns_on_surface.description: This component allows the mob to spawn on the ground. Adding the component causes it to be true, removing it causes the mob to stop spawning on the surface.

minecraft:spawns_underwater.title: minecraft:spawns_underwater
minecraft:spawns_underwater.description: This component allows the mob to spawn underwater. Adding the component causes it to be true, removing it causes the mob to stop spawning underwater.

minecraft:brightness_filter.title: minecraft:brightness_filter
minecraft:brightness_filter.description: This component allows players to set the light level range that causes the mob to spawn.

min.title: min
min.description: This is the minimum light level value that allows the mob to spawn

max.title: max
max.description: This is the maximum light level value that allows the mob to spawn

adjust_for_weather.title: adjust_for_weather
adjust_for_weather.description: This determines if weather can affect the light level conditions that cause the mob to spawn (e.g. Allowing hostile mobs to spawn during the day when it rains.)

minecraft:difficulty_filter.title: minecraft:difficulty_filter
minecraft:difficulty_filter.description: This component allows players determine what mobs spawn when certain difficulty levels are set.

min.title: min
min.description: This is the minimum difficulty level that a mob spawns

max.title: max
max.description: This is the maximum difficulty level that a mob spawns

minecraft:weight.title: minecraft:weight
minecraft:weight.description: This component allows players to give a priority to how often that mob should spawn. Mobs with lower weight values have a higher chance to spawn than mobs with higher weight values.

default.title: default
default.description: This is the priority of the mob spawning

minecraft:herd.title: minecraft:herd
minecraft:herd.description: This component allows players to determine the herd size of animals.

event.title: event
event.description: This is an event that can be triggered from spawning

event_skip_count.title: event_skip_count
event_skip_count.description: This is the number of mobs spawned before the specified event is triggered

min_size.title: min_size
min_size.description: This is the minimum number of mobs that spawn in a herd

max_size.title: max_size
max_size.description: This is the maximum number of mobs that spawn in a herd

minecraft:biome_filter.title: minecraft:biome_filter
minecraft:biome_filter.description: This component allows the players to specify which biomes the mob spawns in. Check below to see which Biome Tags exist, and what each biome is tagged as.
